metadata.synopsis: This VB plays when players first see the results of a druid ritual: indestructible vines have enveloped the entire grove, sealing it off from the outside world. Players cannot get past them to the grove within.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Looks like the ritual worked. The whole grove is walled in.
0.context: NodeContext: Karlach: Sad. tieflings trapped inside.
